pr_title: Add data validation to Alluxio data caching

timeline.message: Add data validation to Alluxio data caching

timeline.bodyText: put FileInStream inputStream to its own line
timeline.author: highker

timeline.bodyText: Let's remove this so that the query runner can test the original IO path.
timeline.author: highker
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -157,6 +157,11 @@ public static DistributedQueryRunner createQueryRunner(
                     .put("hive.assume-canonical-partition-keys", "true")
                     .put("hive.collect-column-statistics-on-write", "true")
                     .put("hive.temporary-table-schema", TEMPORARY_TABLE_SCHEMA)
+                    .put("hive.node-selection-strategy", "SOFT_AFFINITY")
+                    .put("cache.enabled", "true")
+                    .put("cache.type", "ALLUXIO")
+                    .put("cache.base-directory", "file://" + new File("/tmp", "cache").getAbsolutePath())
+                    .put("cache.validation-enabled", "true")

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/presto-hive/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/HiveQueryRunner.java b/presto-hive/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/HiveQueryRunner.java
index 021405389c..67e1e4eeb2 100644
--- a/presto-hive/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/HiveQueryRunner.java
+++ b/presto-hive/src/test/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/HiveQueryRunner.java

@@ -157,11 +157,6 @@ public final class HiveQueryRunner
                     .put("hive.assume-canonical-partition-keys", "true")
                     .put("hive.collect-column-statistics-on-write", "true")
                     .put("hive.temporary-table-schema", TEMPORARY_TABLE_SCHEMA)
-                    .put("hive.node-selection-strategy", "SOFT_AFFINITY")
-                    .put("cache.enabled", "true")
-                    .put("cache.type", "ALLUXIO")
-                    .put("cache.base-directory", "file://" + new File("/tmp", "cache").getAbsolutePath())
-                    .put("cache.validation-enabled", "true")
                     .build();
 
             Map<String, String> storageProperties = extraHiveProperties.containsKey("hive.storage-format") ?

timeline.bodyText: We should avoid fileSystem.openFile in case validation is disabled.
timeline.author: jainxrohit

timeline.bodyText: nit: Can you rename originInputStream to dataTierInputStream? We are using dataTier to represent the origin source, makes it easy to think what it is.
timeline.author: jainxrohit

timeline.bodyText: Should only be done if validation is enabled.
timeline.author: jainxrohit

timeline.bodyText: Lets create this as optional, as it may not be present when validation is disabled.
timeline.author: jainxrohit

Add unit test for Alluxio data validation

1. Add unit teste for data validation logic in AlluxioCachingHdfsFileInputStream
2. Refactor ByteArraySeekableStream class out for reuse.

timeline.bodyText:
Shouldn't this be offset insted of 0?
Can you please test it with a bigger table e.g. order?
timeline.author: jainxrohit

replies.bodyText: It is reading into the temp buffer and comparing from the beginning so it always starting from 0.
replies.author: zhiyua-git

timeline.bodyText: Not really sure what got changed here? If nothing, then can you please fix the format to make sure it does not show in diff?
timeline.author: jainxrohit

replies.bodyText: It is just the formatter, I will revert it back to make the diff minimal.

timeline.bodyText: Can we keep the base method name as testBasic and use it to leverage validation on/off?
